question: The duo -Yvonne Farrell and Shelley McNamara, who were making news recently, are the recipients of which global award?
explanation:
Veteran architect duo- Yvonne Farrell and Shelley McNamara were recently selected as the recipients of the 2020 Pritzker Prize, the highest honour in the field of Architecture.
The Dublin-based architects are the first two women to share the prestigious global award. Their remarkable projects include the University of Engineering and Technology in Lima, Peru, which also won the RIBA International Prize. It is referred to as “modern-day Machu Picchu”.
